items.label: assump-c3-measurement
items.title: Measurement Function $C^3$ Regularity
items.content:
236: :label: assump-c3-measurement
237: 
238: The measurement function $d: \mathcal{X} \to \mathbb{R}$ is three times continuously differentiable with uniformly bounded derivatives:
239: 
240: $$
241: |d(x)| \le d_{\max}, \quad \|\nabla d(x)\| \le d'_{\max}, \quad \|\nabla^2 d(x)\| \le d''_{\max}, \quad \|\nabla^3 d(x)\| \le d'''_{\max}
242: $$
243: 
244: for all $x \in \mathcal{X}$, where $d_{\max}, d'_{\max}, d''_{\max}, d'''_{\max} < \infty$ are constants.
items.raw_directive:
233: To establish $C^3$ regularity of the fitness potential, we require natural smoothness conditions on the primitive functions in the pipeline. These assumptions extend the $C^3$ conditions from Appendix A to the third-order setting.
234:

239:

242: $$
243: 
244: for all $x \in \mathcal{X}$, where $d_{\max}, d'_{\max}, d''_{\max}, d'''_{\max} < \infty$ are constants.

items.label: assump-c3-kernel
items.title: Localization Kernel $C^3$ Regularity
items.content:
250: :label: assump-c3-kernel
251: 
252: The localization kernel $K_\rho: \mathcal{X} \times \mathcal{X} \to [0, 1]$ is three times continuously differentiable in its first argument with bounds:
253: 
254: 1. $|K_\rho(x, x')| \le 1$
255: 2. $\|\nabla_x K_\rho(x, x')\| \le C_{\nabla K}(\rho) / \rho$
256: 3. $\|\nabla^2_x K_\rho(x, x')\| \le C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho) / \rho^2$
257: 4. $\|\nabla^3_x K_\rho(x, x')\| \le C_{\nabla^3 K}(\rho) / \rho^3$
258: 
259: where $C_{\nabla K}(\rho), C_{\nabla^2 K}(\rho), C_{\nabla^3 K}(\rho)$ are $O(1)$ functions of $\rho$ (typically constants for Gaussian kernels).
260: 
261: **Justification:** For the standard Gaussian kernel $K_\rho(x, x') = Z_\rho(x)^{-1} \exp(-\|x-x'\|^2/(2\rho^2))$, direct calculation shows:
262: - $\nabla^m_x K_\rho$ involves products of Hermite polynomials (degree $\le m$) with the exponential
263: - Each derivative introduces a factor of $1/\rho$
264: - The Hermite polynomial coefficients are $O(1)$

items.label: assump-c3-rescale
items.title: Rescale Function $C^3$ Regularity
items.content:
270: :label: assump-c3-rescale
271: 
272: The rescale function $g_A: \mathbb{R} \to [0, A]$ is three times continuously differentiable with bounded derivatives:
273: 
274: $$
275: |g_A(z)| \le A, \quad |g'_A(z)| \le L_{g'_A}, \quad |g''_A(z)| \le L_{g''_A}, \quad |g'''_A(z)| \le L_{g'''_A}
276: $$
277: 
278: for all $z \in \mathbb{R}$, where $A, L_{g'_A}, L_{g''_A}, L_{g'''_A} < \infty$ are constants.

items.label: assump-c3-patch
items.title: Regularized Standard Deviation $C^\infty$ Regularity
items.content:
284: :label: assump-c3-patch
285: 
286: The regularized standard deviation function is defined as:
287: 
288: $$
289: \sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V) := \sqrt{V + \sigma\'^2_{\min}}
290: $$
291: 
292: where $\sigma\'_{\min} = \sqrt{\kappa_{\text{var,min}} + \varepsilon_{\text{std}}^2} > 0$ is the regularization parameter.
293: 
294: This function is **infinitely differentiable** ($C^\infty$) with explicit derivative bounds:
295: 
296: 1. **Positive lower bound:** $\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}(V) \ge \sigma\'_{\min} > 0$ for all $V \ge 0$
297: 2. **Bounded first derivative:** $|(\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V)| \le L_{\sigma\'_{\text{reg}}} = \frac{1}{2\sigma\'_{\min}}$ for all $V \ge 0$
298: 3. **Bounded second derivative:** $|(\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V)| \le L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} = \frac{1}{4\sigma\'^3_{\min}}$ for all $V \ge 0$
299: 4. **Bounded third derivative:** $|(\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V)| \le L_{\sigma'''_{\text{reg}}} = \frac{3}{8\sigma\'^5_{\min}}$ for all $V \ge 0$
300: 
301: **Derivation:** Direct computation of derivatives:
302: 
303: $$
304: (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'(V) = \frac{1}{2\sqrt{V + \sigma\'^2_{\min}}}, \quad
305: (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})''(V) = -\frac{1}{4(V + \sigma\'^2_{\min})^{3/2}}, \quad
306: (\sigma\'_{\text{reg}})'''(V) = \frac{3}{8(V + \sigma\'^2_{\min})^{5/2}}
307: $$
308: 
309: Since $V \ge 0$, all bounds are achieved at $V = 0$.
